snippet: The Dow Jones average closed at another nominal record high, and the S.&P. 500-stock index was two points shy of its nominal record.
abstract: Stock market advances as earnings season begins, with Dow Jones industrial average closing at another nominal record high on rally in cyclical shares.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones average closed at another nominal record high, and the S.&P. 500-stock index was two points shy of its nominal record.

headline.seo: Optimistic Investors Help Markets Make Up Ground
headline.main: Optimistic Investors Help Market Make Up Ground
headline.print_headline: Optimistic Investors Help Market Make Up Ground
